bib.title: Soclake: social latent knowledge explorator
bib.author: Kukla, Grzegorz and Kazienko, Przemys{\l}aw and Br{\'o}dka, Piotr and Filipowski, Tomasz
bib.abstract: In recent world, we have been surrounded by various social networks (SNs). In every company, every institution and every place worldwide, people call each other, exchange emails, text messages, post in forums, co-author documents, meet at diverse events, etc. In other words, they communicate and collaborate with each other creating and maintaining mutual relationships in a complex SN. The traditional expert finding systems try to locate a relevant expert to whom the query should be sent. However, most of the experts are not
